global_param.name: ORDER
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Order]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Order this plugin with other auth frontends]

global_param.name: CREATE_USER
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Create User]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Automatically create user if it does not already exists]

global_param.name: PROTOCOL_TYPE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Protocol Type]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable/disable automatically based on the protocol used]

global_param.name: CAS_PORT
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[CAS Port]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Port where CAS server is running on. Default: 443]

global_param.name: CAS_URI
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[CAS URI]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[URI for CAS service (without / at the end). Default: /]

global_param.name: LOGOUT_URL
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Logout URL]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Redirect to the given URL on loggin out]

global_param.name: MODIFY_LOGIN_SCREEN
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Modify login page]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Login page will be modified to give user a link to authenticate via CAS manually. Otherwise Pydio will redirect automatically to CAS login page.]

global_param.name: AUTH_CAS_MESS_STRING
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[String for CAS auth]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[This message will be appeared in login page. Ex: Use CAS credential]

global_param.name: AUTH_PYD_MESS_STRING
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[String for Pydio auth]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[This message will be appeared in login page. Ex: Use Pydio credential]

global_param.name: ADDITIONAL_ROLE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Additional roles for user logged in by CAS]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Additional roles for user logged in by CAS]

global_param.name: CERTIFICATE_PATH
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Certificate path]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Path to the ca chain that issued the cas server certificate]

global_param.name: DEBUG_FILE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Debug file]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Log to file. If null, use yyyy-mm-dd.txt]

global_param.name: PHPCAS_MODE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[phpCAS mode]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[In mode proxy, phpCAS works as a CAS Proxy who provides Proxy ticket for others services such as SMB, IMAP]

global_param.name: PROXIED_SERVICE_SMB
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Proxied Service]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Proxied service who uses Proxy Ticket provided by this CAS Proxy.Ex smb://pydio.com]

global_param.name: FIXED_CALLBACK_URL
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Set Fixed Callback Url]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[CAS will call this url to pass pgtID and pgtIOU. It's very useful when you deploy Pydio in several nodes]

global_param.name: PTG_STORE_MODE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[PTG store mode]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Config for Proxy Granting Ticket Storage. If is file option, location for storate is session_save_path()]
